abstract.t: The Mobile Mesh Link Discovery Protocol (MMLDP) provides a mediaindependent mechanism for discovering neighbors in a mobile adhocnetwork, and is capable of determining whether links areunidirectional or bidirectional. MMLDP is one protocol in a set ofrelated Mobile Mesh protocols that also includes the Mobile MeshRouting Protocol (MMRP) and the Mobile Mesh Border Discovery Protocol(MMBDP). Together, these protocols provide a flexible, extensiblemobile adhoc networking capability.
